articles.description: Madonna shared the new Frozen Remix music video on Thursday. She showed off her physical prowess as she danced in the visual alongside collaborator Fireboy DML.
articles.content:
After teasing the song and its accompanying video in recent weeks, Madonna shared the new Frozen Remix music video on Thursday.

articles.author: Matt Leone
articles.title: Better Call Saul season 6 trailer teases Saul Goodman’s full evolution - Polygon
articles.description: Jimmy McGill is coming back for his final season, and a new trailer shows the sorts of trouble and hijinks he will get into. The sixth season premieres April 18 on AMC, with the second part set for a July 11 release date.

articles.title: Oscar Isaac's 'Moon Knight' rises as a Marvel superhero with mental-health struggles - USA TODAY
articles.description: Marvel's newest Disney+ series "Moon Knight" debuts Oscar Isaac's new superhero, a supernatural vigilante dealing with dissociative identity disorder.
